name: 109 - Sweet + Floral Tumbler
description:
An explosion of floral delight! An intoxicating blend of authentic jasmine, orange flower, orchid, freesia, peach and warmed with cedarwood, amber, patchouli, musk and vanilla. Topped with notes of peony, tea and bergamot. 

Each Gavin Luxe & Co. soy candle is individually hand-poured in small batches using only the finest quality ingredients and carefully blended fragrances. Our candle burn clean and produce a rich long lasting fragrance. Gavin Luxe & Co. candles are made in our studio in sunny Long Beach, CA. 

8 oz Tumbler
Burn Time: 40 - 50 Hours

name: Red Limited Edition Tumbler
description:
A deep blend of ginger, black pepper, and ylang blossom, leading to a spicy floral middle of gardenia, jasmine, orchid, and clove bud. Sweet smooth bottom notes of sandalwood, vanilla, amber, musk and balsam.

A portion from every sale of our Limited Edition Red Candle will be donated to fund HIV/ AIDS research. 

Each Gavin Luxe & Co. soy candle is individually hand-poured in small batches using only the finest quality ingredients and carefully blended fragrances. Our candle burn clean and produce a rich long lasting fragrance. Gavin Luxe & Co. candles are made in our studio in sunny Long Beach, CA.

8 oz Tumbler
